sources.title: Invasion of Astro-Monster (1965)
sources.description: Invasion of Astro-Monster, also known as Kaijū Daisensō, is a 1965 kaiju film directed by Ishirō Honda. The story follows two astronauts, Fuji and Glenn, who travel to Planet X, where they meet the Xiliens. The aliens request help from Earth, asking to borrow Godzilla and Rodan to combat King Ghidorah, referred to as "Monster Zero." In exchange, they promise a cure for cancer. However, the astronauts soon discover the Xiliens' true intentions, leading to a chaotic battle involving all three monsters.

metadata.Plot: Astronauts Glenn and Fuji are sent to investigate Planet X, a newly discovered planet located just beyond Jupiter. Back on Earth, Fuji's younger sister Haruno meets with her boyfriend inventor Tetsuo Torii. He has developed a sound device that he sells off to a toy company represented by a woman named Namikawa. On planet X, Glen and Fuji encounter mysterious aliens known as the Xiliens. They seek the aid of Earth's people to help save their world from "Monster Zero". In exchange for borrowing Godzilla and Rodan, the Xiliens offer a cure for cancer. As Glenn investigates, he develops a romance with Namikawa and uncovers the Xilien's true intentions.
metadata.Actors: Nick Adams, Akira Takarada, Jun Tazaki
